name: Connotia
overview:
Connotia is a privately held knowledge management company that specializes in competitive intelligence and research analysis of early to mid-stage biopharmaceutical companies. We offer custom solutions to provide scientific, regulatory and market intelligence of unmatched quality with a sense of commercial urgency.

Connotia intelligence teams offer a unique approach to knowledge assimilation. Our experienced researchers work closely with you, the client, to assemble all information desired to help drive your strategic and investment decisions. We work as your proxy in a conference, your expert in a therapeutic area, and your analyst in a market niche. Our synergistic information gathering process allows multi-dimensional expansion of your understanding. Apply our task-specific tools to generate high-quality information you need to make strategic decisions about the trends in new medicines.
